data.actual_result: The Copy ID option is still present on all past messages until you switch to another area or reload your client (this works vice-verse as well)
data.expected_result: The Copy ID option should no longer be present on messages sent prior to disabling it
data.short_description: Copy ID option in the message context menu doesn't update properly on messages sent prior to changing your Developer Mode setting
data.steps_to_repro: - Have Developer Mode enabled in your User Settings -> Appearance (If you didn't have it enabled previously, then switch to another area of Discord after changing it before continuing the steps)  - Send a message into a chat - Go back into your User Settings and disable Developer Mode - Exit out of your User Settings and click the three dots on the message you had sent prior and observe the "Copy ID" option still being present
